channel.title: Non-static variable playerId cannot be referenced from a static - Wth?
channel.description:
Was adding agility, got an orphaned case, fixed it. Got 65 errors, fixed 63, now I have this...
So yeah.
Error... [code] client.java:58: non-static variable playerId cannot be referenced from a static context client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player.playerId]; ^ client.java:64: addSkillXP(int,int) in client cannot be applied to (double,int) addSkillXP(EXPGained,16); ^ client.java:78: addSkillXP(int,int) in client cannot be applied to (double,int) addSkillXP(EXPGained,16); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any... help... Please...

item.title: Non-static variable playerId cannot be referenced from a static - Wth?
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

addSkillXP((int)EXPGained,16);

OMFG THANKS!!!

java jamie:

lol remove the [player.PlayerId] to [PlayerId]

AND THANKS TO YOU TOO!

YAY!

Read full topic

item.title: Non-static variable playerId cannot be referenced from a static - Wth?
item.dc:creator: @Ash_o_lee Ash o lee
item.description:
@Ash_o_lee wrote:

addSkillXP(EXPGained,16);

You need to change “ExpGained 16.” 16 is the agility skill right?
